comments.author: dzungmobile
comments.body: Here you go"Show all" on long topicsHopefully it is what you are looking for.Command for topics with less than 25/50 postsCode:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=printpage;topic=topicIDThis topichttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=printpage;topic=5443847Bigger topic. Does not work.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=printpage;topic=4541166

comments.author: shahzadafzal
comments.body: Quote from: Ratimov on March 07, 2023, 07:40:07 AMTopics with less than 25 pages have a command to view all posts from one page. I remember there is some command or script that allows you to do this with any topic, of any size. Does this technique still work? Please share, I lost this method and can not find its description on the forum. Thanks.Well you can use https://ninjastic.space/search and enter Topic IDI mean definitely you are not going to read all 25+ pages but you will be searching something specific, right?Good thing about ninjastic.space is you can provide the search parameters and even narrow down the search with Start and End Date.
